body_html: Yes this is a use case that we thought about when @alextp was designing the new variable implementation, and will be relatively straightforward. I don't know the timeframe but the idea is that a lot of this functionality will be filled in after TF 1.0 is out.

body: Yes this is a use case that we thought about when @alextp was designing the new variable implementation, and will be relatively straightforward. I don't know the timeframe but the idea is that a lot of this functionality will be filled in after TF 1.0 is out.
